    • Method Detail

      • setDictionary

        void setDictionary(java.lang.String[] words)
        Set the dictionary Note: You should implement another function which will read a file into array then call this function to set the dictionary.
        Parameters:
        words: - an array of words

      • selectRandomSecretWord

        java.lang.String selectRandomSecretWord()
        Pick a random secret word from the dictionary and returns it
        Returns:
        secret word or null

      • guess

        java.lang.String guess(java.lang.Character c)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Receive a new user guess, and verify it against the secret word.
        Parameters:
        c - case insensitive user guess. If c is NULL then ignore it and do no change
        Returns:
        secret word with the remaining hidden characters (use ’-’ instead of unsolved characters), or return NULL if user reached max wrong guesses.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • setMaxWrongGuesses

        void setMaxWrongGuesses(java.lang.Integer max)
        Set the maximum number of wrong guesses
        Parameters:
        max - maximum number of wrong guesses, If it is NULL, then assume it 1
